definition: to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

sentences.english: The budget proposal must be agreed by the state legislature.
sentences.chinese: 该预算提案必须经州立法机关同意。

sentences.english: Legislatures must answer a host of questions.
sentences.chinese: 立法机关必须回应大量问题。

sentences.english: Both bills passed the state Legislature by comfortable margins.
sentences.chinese: 两项法案已经顺利经州立法机关通过。

sentences.english: They railroaded the measure through the legislature.
sentences.chinese: 他们使这项措施在立法机关草率通过。

sentences.english: They gloat at his legislative setbacks.
sentences.chinese: 这些人对他在立法机关所受的挫折幸灾乐祸。

sentences.english: Everybody else is now governed by this legislature.
sentences.chinese: 其他每个人都受立法机关管辖着。

sentences.english: Those excuses that claim legislature to hold the power of legal interpretation can not come into existence .
sentences.chinese: 支持立法机关行使法律解释权的根据是不能成立的。

sentences.english: Country is governed by an elected head of state and legislature.
sentences.chinese: 国家由选举产生的国家首脑和立法机关进行治理。

sentences.english: Has it got the local legislature's consent for launching the reward system?
sentences.chinese: 实行奖励制度已经获得当地立法机关的同意了吗？

sentences.english: He was elected to the state legislature.
sentences.chinese: 他被选举为国家立法机关的委员。

sentences.english: The legislature may impose fresh taxation on us to meet additional expenditure.
sentences.chinese: 立法机关可能要向我们征收新税以满足额外开支。
国会是一个两院制的立法机关。

sentences.english: Legislatures often act in a negatory manner.
sentences.chinese: 立法机关常采取消极行动。

sentences.english: The legislature passed a law to abolish the surtax.
sentences.chinese: 立法机关通过了一项废除附加税的法令。

sentences.english: The legislature repealed the unpopular Rent Act.
sentences.chinese: 立法机关废除了不得人心的租借法案。

sentences.english: The legislature appropriated funds for the university.
sentences.chinese: 立法机关拨款作为大学经费。

definition: (Chinese) National People's Congress/abbr. to 人大[Ren2 da4]
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 min2 Dai4 biao3 Da4 hui4

definition: system of constitutional government/(used as an attributive) constitutional
Standing Committee of the National People's Congress (abbr. of 全國人民代表大會常務委員會|全国人民代表大会常务委员会)
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 Chang2 Wei3 hui4
